articles.title: How the coronavirus could spark a severe slowdown or recession in America
articles.description: The longest economic expansion in American history has survived an unprecedented trade war, a catastrophic tsunami in Japan and a severe crash in oil prices. The fast-moving coronavirus poses yet another grave test.
articles.content:
If the American consumer loses faith, and the coronavirus will be a real test of faith, then a recession is going to happen."
Mark Zandi, chief economist at Moody's Analytics
